summary: The twin of a kindly small-town physician returns from the grave for vengeance against his brother, who secretly killed him because the twin served Satan.
cast: George Zucco|Mary Carlisle|Nedrick Young|Dwight Frye|Fern Emmett|Robert Strange|Hal Price|Sam Flint|Jimmy Aubrey|Frank Matts|Merrill McCormick|Milburn Morante|Rose Plumer|Al St. John|Forrest Taylor
keywords: b movie|stock footage|funeral service|good twin|evil magician
title: Los muertos andan
